treePatterns.rootsQuery:

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

}
ORDER BY (?label)

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

 ?item skos:inScheme spav:vr .
 FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?item skos:broader ?parent. })

 OPTIONAL { ?child skos:broader ?item. }
 BIND(BOUND(?child) AS ?hasChildren)
}
ORDER BY (?label)
treePatterns.parentsQuery:

}

autosuggestionPattern:
SELECT ?value ?label WHERE {
 ?value a crm:E22_Man-Made_Object ;
 crm:P2_has_type spav:dwmkn ;
 rdfs:label ?venue_label .
 SERVICE <http://www.bigdata.com/rdf/search#search> {
 ?venue_label bds:search "?token" ;
 bds:minRelevance "0.1" ;
 bds:relevance ?score ; 
 bds:matchAllTerms "true" .
 }
 FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?value), "/o/"))
 OPTIONAL {
 	?parent crm:P46_is_composed_of ?value ;
 rdfs:label ?parent_label .
 FILTER((LANGMATCHES(LANG(?parent_label), "")) || (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?parent_label), ?__userPreferredLanguage__)))
 }
 OPTIONAL {
 ?value crm:P156_occupies/crm:P89_falls_within/rdfs:label ?place_label .
 FILTER((LANGMATCHES(LANG(?place_label), ?__userPreferredLanguage__)))
 }

 BIND(IF(BOUND(?parent_label), CONCAT(?venue_label, " (", ?parent_label, IF(BOUND(?place_label), CONCAT(", ", ?place_label), ""), ")"), IF(BOUND(?place_label), CONCAT(?venue_label, " (", ?place_label, ")"), ?venue_label)) AS ?label)
 FILTER((LANGMATCHES(LANG(?venue_label), "")) || (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?venue_label), ?__userPreferredLanguage__)))
 BIND(LCASE(REPLACE(REPLACE(str(?token),"\\*", ""), "\\\\", "")) as ?lower_token)
 BIND(LCASE(?venue_label) AS ?venue_label_lower)
 
 BIND(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 	REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 			 str(?lower_token),"á","a"),
 "é","e")
 ,"í","i"),
 "ó","o"),
 "ú","u"),
 "ü","u"),
 "ö","o") as ?clean_token)
 
 BIND(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 str(?venue_label_lower),"á","a"),
	 					"é","e")
			 	 ,"í","i"),
			 "ó","o"),
		 "ú","u"),
	 "ü","u"),
 "ö","o")
 as ?venue_label_clean) .

 FILTER(contains(STR(?venue_label_clean),?clean_token))
} LIMIT 20

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

treePatterns.searchQuery:
PREFIX bds: <http://www.bigdata.com/rdf/search#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX rico: <https://www.ica.org/standards/RiC/ontology#>
PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/>
PREFIX lookup: <http://www.metaphacts.com/ontologies/platform/repository/lookup#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX Repository: <http://www.metaphacts.com/ontologies/repository#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?label ?score ?hasChildren WHERE {
 ?item a rico:Place ;
 	rdfs:label ?label .
 ?label bds:search ?__token__ ;
 bds:matchAllTerms "true" .
 FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?item), "/p/"))
 OPTIONAL { ?child crm:P89_falls_within ?item. }
 BIND(BOUND(?child) AS ?hasChildren)
}
ORDER BY DESC (?score) (?label)
LIMIT 200

selectPattern:
SELECT ?value ?label
WHERE {
 $subject owl:sameAs ?value .
 BIND(REPLACE(STR(?value), ".*\\/c*b*", "") as ?localname)
 BIND(STRBEFORE(STR(?value), ?localname) as ?prefix)
 VALUES(?prefix ?source ?order)
 {
 ("http://www.wikidata.org/entity/" "Wikidata" 0)
 ("http://www.isni.org/" "ISNI" 1)
 ("http://viaf.org/viaf/" "VIAF" 2)
 ("http://d-nb.info/gnd/" "GND" 3)
 ("https://catalogue.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/cb" "BnF" 4)
 ("http://geonames.org/" "Geonames" 5)
 ("http://classifications.data.admin.ch/municipality/" "Swiss Municipality" 6)
 ("http://classifications.data.admin.ch/canton/" "Swiss Municipality" 7)
 ("http://tls.theaterwissenschaft.ch/wiki/" "Theaterlexikon der Schweiz" 8)
 }
 BIND(IF(?order<8, CONCAT(?source,": ",?localname), ?source) AS ?label)
} ORDER BY ASC(?order)
description: Expects URIs from other databases such as Wikidata, GND, etc.
label: External resources
Subtitle Language
Location
